rows.label: tlk70000138_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Typical. Of course my dad would
be still be lost in his inventions
even at a time like this.

rows.label: tlk70000138_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I don't have much experience yet, but
I can still steer Divine Beast ships
now, so I might go help Wotta-san.

rows.label: tlk70000138_05_msg0003
rows.name:
It'd been a while since I'd
been to the capital. This
being my hometown and all.
